articles.author: Charlie Weston
articles.title: European Commission charges Insurance Ireland with breaching competition rules - Independent.ie
articles.description: EUROPEAN regulators have charged Insurance Ireland with breaching competition rules by restricting competition in the motor insurance market here.
articles.content:
EUROPEAN regulators have charged Insurance Ireland with breaching competition rules by restricting competition in the motor insurance market here.

articles.author: CNA
articles.title: Football: De Bruyne leads Belgium to 2-1 comeback Euro 2020 win over Denmark - CNA
articles.description: Denmark scored the second-fastest goal in European Championship history but Belgium advanced to the knockout stages after Kevin de Bruyne orchestrated a 2-1 comeback victory in their Group B match on Thursday.
articles.content: COPENHAGEN: Kevin de Bruyne came off the bench to inspire Belgium to a 2-1 comeback win over Denmark on Thursday and a place in the Euro 2020 knockout stages on an emotional afternoon of tributes to … [+3342 chars]
